alfredsnippet.snippet:
trace1 = go.Bar(
    x=['giraffes', 'orangutans', 'monkeys'],
    y=[20, 14, 23],
    name='SF Zoo'
)
trace2 = go.Bar(
    x=['giraffes', 'orangutans', 'monkeys'],
    y=[12, 18, 29],
    name='LA Zoo'
)

data = [trace1, trace2]
layout = go.Layout(
    barmode='stack'
)

fig = go.Figure(data=data, layout=layout)
iplot(fig, filename='stacked-bar')
alfredsnippet.name: plot plotly barplot stacked
